thread.title: Manchester City news: Sergio Aguero wants Real Madrid transfer | Metro News
thread.title_full: Manchester City news: Sergio Aguero wants Real Madrid transfer | Metro News

author: Chris Davie For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Manchester City news: Sergio Aguero wants Real Madrid transfer | Metro News
text:
Tottenham chairman Daniel Levy takes swipe at Arsenal 
Following Jesus’ arrival at the Etihad Stadium, Aguero spent four consecutive games on the bench before the Brazilian suffered a fractured metatarsal, which will keep him sidelined for around two months. 
Earlier this season, Aguero was also surprisingly dropped for City’s Champions League clash with Barcelona in the group stage. 
Publicly, Aguero has insisted that he does not want to leave but claims it is up to City to decide his fate at the end of the season. Aguero says City will decide his future at the end of the season. (Getty Images) 
‘No, no, I don’t want to leave,’ the striker said earlier this month. 
‘I have to help the team as much as I can in these three months. Afterwards we’ll see what the club wants to do with me. 
‘In three years, my contract is up – that’s why I say I’m happy at the club. In these last three months that are left I have to help the club and, as I say, the club will decide if I have a place here or not.’
